data.pricing_trends: Airfare tends to dip in September and October, making it affordable for travelers. Accommodations offer discounts during this period.
data.booking_windows: Best to book flights and hotels 1-3 months in advance to avoid price spikes. Most significant pre-holiday travel occurs in early November.
data.demand: Autumn sees a steady demand, especially around local festivals.
data.competition: Compared to other Central American countries, Guatemala offers unique cultural experiences and lower costs.
